subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Defensive end Michael Strahan had a chance to defuse an evolving he-said, he-said that he started with receiver Plaxico Burress. He instead turned the episode into the latest potentially divisive controversy for the Giants.
snippet: Defensive end Michael Strahan had a chance to defuse an evolving he-said, he-said that he started with receiver Plaxico Burress. He instead turned the episode into the latest potentially divisive controversy for the Giants.
